price: Na kae Mar’yam nso (ho asԑm) wͻ Nwoma no mu. Ɛberε a ͻtwee ne ho frii n’abusuafoͻ ho kͻͻ apueɛ fam hͻ baabi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَرۡيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتۡ مِنۡ أَهۡلِهَا مَكَانٗا شَرۡقِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi maryama idhi intabadhat min ahlihā makānan sharqiyyan
